issue.title: [Dev] Python merge script doesn't close PRs if not merged on master
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10198](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10198). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When using the merge script to merge PRs against non-master branches, the PR on Github doesn't get closed.
